verses.name: 1 Samuel 16:18
verses.text: Then answered one of the servants, and said, Behold, I have seen a son of Jesse the Beth–lehemite, that is cunning in playing, and a mighty valiant man, and a man of war, and prudent in matters, and a comely person, and the Lord is with him.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 16:19
verses.text: Wherefore Saul sent messengers unto Jesse, and said, Send me David thy son, which is with the sheep.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 16:20
verses.text: And Jesse took an ass laden with bread, and a bottle of wine, and a kid, and sent them by David his son unto Saul.
